overview: Eight naturally stacked babes travel to a seaside paradise on the north coast of the Dominican Republic, but they don't know why they're there. When they find out they're in a compe-TIT-ion to get the cover of SCORE magazine, the clothes come off for some of the wildest tit-to-tit action you'll ever see. Our biggest on-location movie since the 2000 Boob Cruise is a big-boob lover's dream-come-true, packed with the scenes you've fantasized about and starring Sha Rizel, Demmy Blaze, Alexya, Codi Vore, Kitty Cute, Daria and the fabulous Star sisters Helen and Erin. Wild wall-to-wall group action and loaded with slow-motion bouncing boobs. It's the big-boob event of the year!
title: On Location: North Coast
